section.name: Downloading Simple-JNDI
section.p: For most Simple-JNDI functionality, you'll just need to download the simple-jndi-x.x.x.jar, either from ibiblio.org or from dist.osjava.org.
Alternatively, you could download the full distribution (source and javadoc) from dist.osjava.org/releases/official, as listed on the download page.
